titleStmt.title: The pleasant and delightful history of King Henry 8th. and a cobler relating how he came acquainted with the cobler, and the pleasant humours that happened thereupon, [et]c. To which is added, The cobler's song in the Kings celler.
History of the King and the cobler.

The pleasant and delightful history of King Henry 8th. and a cobler relating how he came acquainted with the cobler, and the pleasant humours that happened thereupon, [et]c. To which is added, The cobler's song in the Kings celler.
History of the King and the cobler.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C. Dennisson, at the Stationers-Arms, within Aldgate,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from and date conjectured by Wing.
At foot of title page, below imprint: Price two-pence.
"The coblers song in the King's celler. To the tune of, Jenny Gin" is in verse.
B4v, final leaf, bears advertisement for Charles Dennisson.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
